name: OtherRevascularization_CPT
title: Other Revascularization_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Other Revascularization exclusion in the Statin Use For Diabetes Care Need.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Other Revascularization for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Other Revascularization for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Other Revascularization Codes that constitute the Other Revascularization for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
